name: Sort Out (JJAngelus)
description:
Sort Out is a casual game that sometimes requires quick reflexes  but it is relatively easy to master and short in length.

It was created as my first-time game for G-Develop's Game Jam #3 for fun. The theme was separation so I decided to base separation on a number of things.  Separate food items, separate animals, separate planets..etc .

The objective is to click or drag items to the correct bin when their name is called, earning points for each correct action and effectively sorting (separating) them. 

The game can be played using only the mouse (though I am working on the mobile counterpart still.) The game also has a leaderboard where players can enter their name to compete with others. Before you get to the leader board though, you will receive a Star rating based on your overall performance (score) across the separate stages. One is the highest ranking star and it is golden-yellow.

I am still working on some things but I know the game Jam ends soon and so I have submitted.
